akn:section.akn:heading: Methods of determination of sanitary sewer service charges.

akn:content.akn:p: The sanitary sewer service charges established under the authority of this subchapter shall be based on the following:

Notwithstanding the provisions of subsection (a), the Council of the District of Columbia is authorized, in its discretion, from time to time to establish 1 or more sanitary sewer service charges at such amount as the Council, on the basis of a recommendation made by the Mayor, finds it necessary to meet the expense to the District of furnishing sanitary sewer services, including debt retirement.
Any owner or occupant of a property that is assessed an impervious surface fee has a right to an appeal under ยง 34-2305.
